content:
From: Markus Roggenbach <m.roggenbach@swansea.ac.uk>
Dear colleagues,

this is to let you know that there are a number of open positions at Swansea University, Wales, UK, which offer excellent research opportunities. The positions shall strengthen research directions already in existence at Swanseaâ€™s CS department. They offer the opportunity to shape teaching and research of the subjects in the Swansea Department.

Markus
